title: Clairvoyance assists
body:
Most people don't use it, it's kind of useless.  I like to take it every now and then when I'm playing Bard.  But why not add a little more utility to it?  How about if it reveals an enemy which goes on to get killed, then you get an assist on it? 

Would be a nice way to get a few extra assists for a support!

replies.body: It would be really nice if they improve it somehow tbh cause I honestly forgot it existed. I don't even think I've ever seen it used in an actual game/ever! I like this idea. ^^

even though no support uses it the only spell a normal sup uses is ignite exhaust then flash.
altho it would be good for the {{item:3363}} and {{item:3342}}
